common.title: En Shin - Acupuncture NFT Service
common.description: Innovative acupuncture service with NFT tickets

hero.mainCatchphrase: Transform Your Wellness with En Shin
hero.subCatchphrase: Experience the future of acupuncture with blockchain technology.

aboutSection.title: About En Shin
aboutSection.paragraph1: En Shin is revolutionizing traditional acupuncture by integrating NFT technology. Our unique approach offers not just health benefits but also exclusive access and rewards for our community.
aboutSection.paragraph2: We believe in combining ancient healing practices with modern innovation to provide a unique wellness experience.

nftAcupuncture.title: NFT Acupuncture Treatment
nftAcupuncture.description: Experience personalized acupuncture sessions secured and enhanced by NFT technology.

traditionalAcupuncture.title: Traditional Acupuncture
traditionalAcupuncture.description: Benefit from classic acupuncture techniques tailored to your health needs.

onlineConsultation.title: Online Consultation
onlineConsultation.description: Receive expert advice and personalized wellness plans from the comfort of your home.

artistProfile.title: Meet Our Practitioner
artistProfile.name: Futoshi Iwasawa
artistProfile.bio: With over 10 years of experience, Mr. Iwasawa specializes in holistic healing and integrates traditional methods with modern technology.

pricePayment.title: Pricing & Payment
pricePayment.acceptPaymentMethods: We accept various payment methods, including cryptocurrency for NFT transactions.

purchaseMethod.title: How to Purchase
purchaseMethod.description: Easily purchase on NFT marketplaces like OpenSea.

therapist.title: Our Therapist

therapist.description: Experienced acupuncturist specializing in holistic healing techniques
